definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: If you've got cash and don't need to worry about interest rates, it's a buyer's market.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有现金，并不担心利率，这是一个买方市场。

sentences.english: The women, being in a buyer’s market, can set high standards.
sentences.chinese: 而妇女则成为买方市场，她们可以设置极高的标准。

sentences.english: China has bid farewell to scarcity economy in the past several years and the buyer's market emerged.
sentences.chinese: 我国近年来告别短缺经济，形成买方市场。

sentences.english: In a buyer's market, you may encounter very little competition for that home.
sentences.chinese: 在买方市场中，你在买房时遇到的竞争很少。

sentences.english: An unusually good summer created a buyer's market in tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 夏季气候特别好，形成了番茄的买方市场。

sentences.english: Simply put, a buyer's market is generally a very good time in which to buy.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，买方市场正是买房的极佳时机。

sentences.english: Because of the economic times in buyer's market, not sale has blind lane only.
sentences.chinese: 因为在买方市场的经济时代，不营销只有死路一条。

sentences.english: But the truth is they will pay more for that home than in a buyer's market.
sentences.chinese: 他们将会比在买方市场时购房花更多的钱。

sentences.english: When the market of customer-centered is coming, the enterprises rely more and more on marketing of public praise.
sentences.chinese: 随着买方市场的出现，口碑营销的发展潜力越来越大。

sentences.english: Representatives of the NAR say that this makes it the best buyer's market in a long time.
sentences.chinese: NAR发言人说这会在很长一段时间形成买方市场。

definition: bad money drives out good money (economics)
pinyin: lie4 bi4 qu1 zhu2 liang2 bi4

definition: many wolves and not enough meat/not enough to go around
